name: Gumroad thumbnail mockup generator
description:
Using this file you can create, preview, A/B test and export the thumbnail for your Gumroad product. Instructions inside. Video walkthrough here:


https://youtu.be/EVDPRjFBwX4


If you have any q's in the meantime, hit me up on Discord: https://discord.gg/cWrqHDUqMU
